All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
AppContextListener
The type App context listener. initiate the DB before everything, and save the request counter (ID).
FullDataBase
The type Full data base.
MainServlet
main servlet - launch the welcome page
MyThreads
The type My threads. create a thread with the user id. url to check and the current depth to check for the recursion.
RequestDataBase
The type Request data base. each user/client get his own UserDataBase object.
Result
this servlet responsible for show the result. any time that the user refresh the page - the result will update.
StartCrawl
this servlet responsible for checking the url that the user gave and if is valid - a. give to the request new ID and save the ID in user session.
